title: Can Aatrox's Justicar skin keep his old(current) Voiceover after his rework?
body:
I feel like Aatrox's old voiceover would fit nicely on his Justicar skin. I really like his old voice, it's actually one of my favorite champion voices, and I'd hate to see it just vanish forever after his rework.
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}
